seq_adult_cj_1.Description: How often does someone give you help when you need it?

seq_adult_cj_2.Description: How often do you get hit by another person?

seq_adult_cj_3.Description: How often do others leave you out on purpose when it is time to make plans or work in a group?

seq_adult_cj_4.Description: How often does someone yell at you and call you names?

seq_adult_cj_5.Description: How often does someone try to cheer you up when you feel sad or upset?

seq_adult_cj_6.Description: How often does someone who is mad at you try to get back at you by excluding you from their group?

seq_adult_cj_7.Description: How often do you get pushed or shoved by another person?

seq_adult_cj_8.Description: How often does someone do something that makes you feel happy?

seq_adult_cj_9.Description: How often does someone tell lies about you to make others not like you anymore?

seq_adult_cj_10.Description: How often does someone kick you or pull your hair?

seq_adult_cj_11.Description: How often does someone say they won't like you unless you do what they want you to do?

seq_adult_cj_12.Description: How often does another person say something nice to you?

seq_adult_cj_13.Description: How often does someone try to keep others from liking you by saying mean things about you?

seq_adult_cj_14.Description: How often does another person say they will beat you up if you don't do what they want you to do?

seq_adult_cj_15.Description: How often do others let you know that they care about you?
